content: 7 switch to yellow yarn round 7 fpsc around = 30 sts fig 3 round 8 5 single_crochet 3 increase 2 single_crochet increase repeat 4 times 2 single_crochet 3 increase 5 single_crochet = 40 sts --- insert and secure safety eyes --- fig 4 & 5 round 9 through round 13 single_crochet around = 40 sts round 14 8 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 36 sts after round 15 before round 15 and round 16 single_crochet around = 36 sts round 16 switch to black yarn round 17 10 decrease repeat around = 33 sts ---stuff head here i stuff lightly especially if creating a pouch version --- round 18 fpsc around = 33 sts round 19 2 single_crochet increase repeat around = 44 sts round 20 10 single_crochet increase repeat around = 48 sts after round 20 before round 21 through round 25 single_crochet around = 48 sts round 21 switch to yellow yarn round 26 4 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 40 round 27 through round 31 single_crochet around = 40 sts after round 28 before round 30 switch to black yarn 6 © emma scanga 2020 body continued after round 31 before round 32 switch to round 32 3 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 32 sts white yarn round 33 2 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 24 sts round 34 single_crochet around = 24 sts round 35 single_crochet decrease repeat around = 18 sts ---finish stuffing body --- round 36 decrease around = 8 sts cut a tail about 8 inches or 20 cm - just long enough to sew body closed yarn over and pull tail through completely… this is a bind off sew closed fig 6 make make thorax plate 1 6 *in shell color-- crochet in row -- no chain 1 turn at the end of each row just insert into the stitch closest to the hook if the format looks confusing - refer to page 4* start with a long tail for later sewing at least 12 inches/20 cm row 1 chain 15 turn = 15 sts 15 single_crochet in chbp turn = 15 sts row 2 2 single_crochet increase 9 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet turn = 17 sts 17 single_crochet turn = 17 sts row 3 increase 15 single_crochet increase turn = 19 sts 4 single_crochet increase 9 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet = 21 sts row 4 21 single_crochet turn = 21 sts 9 single_crochet 3 increase 9 single_crochet turn = 24 sts row 5 single_crochet 2 decrease 6 single_crochet decrease 6 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet turn = 19 sts single_crochet 8 slip_stitch single_crochet 8 slip_stitch single_crochet = 19 sts bind off with short tail to hide hide the tail in the last few stitches but keep the beginning tail for sewing to the body fig 7 7 © emma scanga 2020 make shell 2 *in shell color-- crochet in row -- no chain 1 turn at the end of each row just insert into the stitch closest to the hook if
